issue.title: [CF 1208] Change spell-list im multible groups.
issue.body:
For example i have 5 groups, wich monitor defensive buffs on party1-5. So when i want to add new buff, i need to add it 5 times. Take too much time. Is there is a way to add new spell to multiple groups?


> Posted by CurseForge user Hearthstonemakesmemad | Imported from CurseForge issue #1208 | Raw

comments.body:
No, there isn't.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
